item.title: The Rocker Project
item.description: Getting Started To get started right away, ensure you have Docker installed and start R in a container with: docker run --rm -ti rocker/r-base Or get started with an RStudio® instance: docker run -p 8787:8787 rocker/rstudio and point your browser to localhost:8787. Log in with user/password rstudio/rstudio to get started. License The Dockerfiles in this repository are licensed under the GPL 2 or later. Trademarks RStudio® is a registered trademark of RStudio, Inc.
